title: The Writer's Almanac -  Thursday, January 21, 2021
description: “I am reduced to a thing that wants Virginia.” –Vita Sackville West in a letter written to her lover Virginia Wolf from a train in Italy on this day in 1926.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “I am reduced to a thing that wants Virginia.” –Vita Sackville West in a letter written to her lover Virginia Wolf from a train in Italy on this day in 1926.
